text: geudaedeul(yudaeindeul)eun naega naelin geos(kkulan)eul mid-eula, geugeos-eun geudaedeul-i gajin geos-eul hwagjeunghaneun geos-ila. geuligo jeil meonjeo geugeos-eul bulsinhaneun jaga doeji malla. naui jingpyodeullosseo hachanh-eun iig-eul chaeng-giji mal geos-imyeo geudaedeul-eun naman-eul gyeong-oehala
